nodes.text: Ankot Station was a space station located on the inner fringe of the Outer Rim Territories. The station was under the control of Galactic Empire during its reign, becoming a highly trafficked base. After the Battle of Jakku, the station was controlled by various spicerunner gangs before the New Republic formally took it over. However, the New Republic's control was in name only, and Ankot Station was abandoned.

Zorii Bliss, Poe Dameron, and the droid EV-6B6, members of the Spice Runners of Kijimi, visited the station to make a deal with the smuggler Alfris Sotin. However, Sotin betrayed the Spice Runners to the Guavian Death Gang, leading to a skirmish in which Bliss and Dameron escaped.
